basics.name: Koutian Wu (吴叩天)
basics.summary: AI4Geoscience PhD student at UT-Austin Jackson School of Geosciences, specializing in explainable AI for physics-based land surface modeling. Former undergraduate at USTC with expertise in space physics and atmospheric sciences.

work.company: Jackson School of Geosciences, The University of Texas at Austin
work.summary: AI for Noah-MP Land Surface Model: Implementing rock and wood moisture into the Noah-MP land surface model. Advised by Dr. Zong-Liang Yang, Dr. Daniella Rampe, Dr. Ashley Matheny.

work.company: NSF NCAR - The National Center for Atmospheric Research
work.summary: Project Admin for NCAR/CISL Allocation Project UTAA0012: 'Explainable AI for Improving Physics-Based Noah-MP Land Surface Modeling of Plant–Rock–Water Interactions.' Awarded 1,000 GPU hours on NSF NCAR Derecho-GPU, 20,000 CPU core-hours, and 2 TB campaign storage.

Designed and implemented AI evaluation system architecture for AI Agent knowledge base assessment. Developed automated data anonymization algorithms processing 1000+ conversation texts with 70%+ accuracy.

Built comprehensive LLM text processing system integrating text polishing, AI detection, and plagiarism reduction features. Developed RESTful API backend using FastAPI with Celery+Redis, improving processing efficiency by 65%+.

work.company: The University of Texas at Austin
work.summary: Earth in 2100 (GEO 303E): Prepared course syllabus, office hours, and graded homework for ~1040 students.

education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin
education.area: Ph.D. in Geological and Earth Sciences/Geosciences
courses: Model Optimization: Physics-based Land Surface Models (Noah-MP, CTSM, HRLDAS)

education.institution: University of Science and Technology of China
education.area: B.S. with Honors in Geological and Earth Sciences/Geosciences
courses: Founding President, USTC Student Xingyun Poetry Club (Currently 1,197+ members)

publications.name: Diurnal and seasonal variations of meteor speed and arrival angle observed by Mengcheng meteor radar
publications.summary: Investigation of diurnal and seasonal variations of meteor speed and arrival angle using Mengcheng meteor radar observations, providing insights into meteoroid dynamics in the mesosphere and lower thermosphere.

publications.name: A Summary Report on the Space Physics Practical Education in 2022
publications.publisher: Review of Geophysics and Planetary Physics
publications.summary: Comprehensive report on space physics practical education initiatives in 2022, documenting educational programs and outcomes in space science education.

presentations.name: Noah-MP land surface model with plant hydraulics scheme (Noah-MP-PHS) Evaluation
presentations.description: Poster presentation evaluating the Noah-MP land surface model with plant hydraulics scheme.

presentations.name: Perturbations by the 2022 Hunga-Tonga Volcano Eruption in the MLT Region Investigated Using WACCM-X Simulation and Meteor Radar Observations
presentations.description: Oral presentation on volcanic perturbations in the mesosphere and lower thermosphere.

presentations.name: Perturbations by the 2022 Hunga-Tonga Volcano Eruption in the MLT Region Investigated Using the WACCM-X Simulation and Meteor Radar Observations
presentations.description: Poster presentation at AGU 2023 documenting global-scale atmospheric perturbations from volcanic eruption.

teaching.institution: University of Texas at Austin, Jackson School of Geosciences
teaching.description: Prepared and led weekly office hours for 520+ students, graded assignments, and provided mentorship for an interdisciplinary course examining Earth system changes and climate projections.

portfolio.name: Explainable AI for Noah-MP Land Surface Modeling
portfolio.description: NCAR-funded project implementing AI to improve physics-based land surface models for plant-rock-water interactions. Awarded 1,000 GPU hours and significant computational resources.

portfolio.name: AI Text Processing System
portfolio.description: Full-stack LLM text processing system with polishing, AI detection, and plagiarism reduction features. Built with FastAPI, Celery, Redis, achieving 65%+ efficiency improvement.

portfolio.name: AI Agent Knowledge Base Evaluation System
portfolio.description: Multi-dimensional AI agent evaluation system with data anonymization and LLM-as-a-judge architecture. Achieved 70%+ accuracy in sensitive information identification.
